DOC.brief_title: RIBS V ( Restenosis Intra-stent Bare Metal Stents : Paclitaxel-eluting Balloon v Everolimus-eluting Stent )
DOC.detailed_description: Treatment patient bare metal stent restenosis remain major clinical technical challenge . Currently , drug-eluting stent widely use management patient . Recently , value paclitaxel-eluting balloon clinical setting suggest . However , scarce observational data value new balloon patient bare metal stent restenosis . This prospective , multicenter , randomize clinical trial compare two different interventional strategy ( namely , paclitaxel-eluting balloon v everolimus-eluting stent ) treatment patient bare metal stent restenosis .
DOC.criteria: PATIENT : Age 20 85 year Signed informed consent Acceptance late angiographic control ( 69 month ) Angina / objective evidence ischemia LESION : InStent restenosis ( > 50 % visual ) bare metal stent Knowledge prior stent location PATIENT : Inclusion another clinical research protocol Women childbearing age Severe associate systemic disease ( include renal liver failure ) Severe depression leave ventricular ejection fraction ( LVEF < 25 % ) Disease affect life expectancy Recent myocardial infarction ( < 7 day ) Time implantation previous BMS < 1 month Severe difficulty expect late angiographic study LESION : Angiographic failure implementation initial stent ( residual stenosis > 50 % ) Image large thrombus instent ( > vessel diameter ) Tortuosity Ca + + severe difficulty prior stent deployment Vessel diameter < 2 mm ( visual estimate ) Restenosis `` outside '' stent ( The edge stent affect ) Completely occlusive restenosis ( 100 % , TIMI 0 ) Very diffuse restenosis ( > 30 mm length )
